perturbation.original_text: Contract is renewable for 1 year extension by amendment to this agreement. Either Party may terminate this agreement for non-cause with a sixty (60) written notice.
perturbation.changed_text: Contract is renewable for 1 year extension by amendment to this agreement. Either Party may terminate this agreement for non-cause with a thirty (30) written notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states a 60-day notice is required for non-cause termination. Changing it to 30 days directly contradicts section 10, which details specific termination clauses, including the 60-day notice for non-cause termination mentioned in the preamble. This creates ambiguity regarding the actual required notice period for termination.
